message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $15000. It's a unique opportunity, and I'm confident you'll find it very valuable. Let me know what you think!
Hi Alice, $15000 is a bit steep for me. I'm really interested in the product but I'm only able to offer $8000 at this time. Let me know what you think.

Hi Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $8000 is simply too low for me. I'm willing to come down a bit to $12000. This reflects the value of the product and gives you a good deal. Let's meet in the middle!

Alice, I understand your perspective, but $12000 is still higher than my budget. I'm willing to go up to $9500. This shows my serious interest, and I hope it's a starting point for us to find a solution.

Bob, I see your commitment to this product, but I can't go lower than $10000. This is my absolute minimum.  It's a fair price considering the product's value, and it gives us both a good deal. Let me know if you're willing to meet me there.
